name: 8Bit Killer
notes:
The music works, not so the audio fx (shots and the likes). Stays in fullscreen when it should be windowed.

CONTROLS:
Move - QWEASD and cursors
Status screen - Space bar
Mouse - Look
Mouse left buttom - Shoot
Mouse right buttum - Activate
Enter - Change screen mode
content:
files:
- gamezip: https://www.locomalito.com/juegos/8bit_killer.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/8Bit_Killer/8bit_killer.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/8Bit_Killer
    file: gamezip
    format: zip
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/8Bit_Killer/8bit_killer.exe
wine:
  Audio: alsa
  Desktop: false
